description: Retrieves a short summary of discovered assets. This API operation takes no request parameters and is called as is at the command prompt as shown in the example.

nested_items.name: servers
nested_items.description: The number of servers discovered.

nested_items.name: applications
nested_items.description: The number of applications discovered.

nested_items.name: serversMappedToApplications
nested_items.description: The number of servers mapped to applications.

nested_items.name: serversMappedtoTags
nested_items.description: The number of servers mapped to tags.

nested_items.name: agentSummary
nested_items.description: Details about discovered agents, including agent status and health.

nested_items.name: activeAgents
nested_items.description: Number of active discovery agents.

nested_items.name: healthyAgents
nested_items.description: Number of healthy discovery agents.

nested_items.name: blackListedAgents
nested_items.description: Number of blacklisted discovery agents.

nested_items.name: shutdownAgents
nested_items.description: Number of discovery agents with status SHUTDOWN.

nested_items.name: unhealthyAgents
nested_items.description: Number of unhealthy discovery agents.

nested_items.name: totalAgents
nested_items.description: Total number of discovery agents.

nested_items.name: unknownAgents
nested_items.description: Number of unknown discovery agents.

nested_items.name: connectorSummary
nested_items.description: Details about discovered connectors, including connector status and health.

nested_items.name: activeConnectors
nested_items.description: Number of active discovery connectors.

nested_items.name: healthyConnectors
nested_items.description: Number of healthy discovery connectors.

nested_items.name: blackListedConnectors
nested_items.description: Number of blacklisted discovery connectors.

nested_items.name: shutdownConnectors
nested_items.description: Number of discovery connectors with status SHUTDOWN,

nested_items.name: unhealthyConnectors
nested_items.description: Number of unhealthy discovery connectors.

nested_items.name: totalConnectors
nested_items.description: Total number of discovery connectors.

nested_items.name: unknownConnectors
nested_items.description: Number of unknown discovery connectors.

nested_items.name: meCollectorSummary
nested_items.description: Details about Migration Evaluator collectors, including collector status and health.

nested_items.name: activeMeCollectors
nested_items.description: The number of active Migration Evaluator collectors.

nested_items.name: healthyMeCollectors
nested_items.description: The number of healthy Migration Evaluator collectors.

nested_items.name: denyListedMeCollectors
nested_items.description: The number of deny-listed Migration Evaluator collectors.

nested_items.name: shutdownMeCollectors
nested_items.description: The number of Migration Evaluator collectors with SHUTDOWN status.

nested_items.name: unhealthyMeCollectors
nested_items.description: The number of unhealthy Migration Evaluator collectors.

nested_items.name: totalMeCollectors
nested_items.description: The total number of Migration Evaluator collectors.

nested_items.name: unknownMeCollectors
nested_items.description: The number of unknown Migration Evaluator collectors.

nested_items.name: agentlessCollectorSummary
nested_items.description: Details about Agentless Collector collectors, including status.

nested_items.name: activeAgentlessCollectors
nested_items.description: The number of active Agentless Collector collectors.

nested_items.name: healthyAgentlessCollectors
nested_items.description: The number of healthy Agentless Collector collectors.

nested_items.name: denyListedAgentlessCollectors
nested_items.description: The number of deny-listed Agentless Collector collectors.

nested_items.name: shutdownAgentlessCollectors
nested_items.description: The number of Agentless Collector collectors with SHUTDOWN status.

nested_items.name: unhealthyAgentlessCollectors
nested_items.description: The number of unhealthy Agentless Collector collectors.

nested_items.name: totalAgentlessCollectors
nested_items.description: The total number of Agentless Collector collectors.

nested_items.name: unknownAgentlessCollectors
nested_items.description: The number of unknown Agentless Collector collectors.
